name: Spell Bear
description:
Spell Bear!

You are practicing magic when suddenly, oh no! Everything goes wrong! Now the whole room is out to get you!

Use your awesome wizardry skills to stay alive and get cash money!

Upgrade your skills to become undefeatable!

CONTROLS:

Movement: WASD or ARROW KEYS
Attack: Hold LEFT MOUSE BUTTON
Aim: Move MOUSE

IF YOU ARE GETTING LAG, TRY THE HTML5 VERSION:

http://torcado.com/games/spellbear/html5/

Made for Ludum Dare 37! Check out the game page: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=p...

Thanks a lot for playing! I hope you have as much fun playing it as I did making it ;)
